snippet.title: The Last Worker | Venice Film Festival | Oculus VR Teaser
snippet.description:
Wired Productions, Oiffy and Wolf & Wood are excited to announce that The Last Worker from Writer / Director Jörg Tittel has been selected by the 78th Venice International Film Festival (La Biennale di Venezia), which will run from 1st to 11th September.

Competing in the VR Expanded category where it is nominated for a Golden Lion, the World Premiere first chapter of The Last Worker will be accessible exclusively to the jury and accredited festival guests on Oculus Quest/Quest 2. Among the 25 nominees, The Last Worker is the only videogame.

Featuring uniquely immersive gameplay, handcrafted 3D and 2D visuals based on concepts by comics legend Mick McMahon and a multi-instrumental score, The Last Worker features intense performances from an all-star cast (to be announced in early September).

#TheLastWorker #VeniceFilmFestival #Venezia78 

Wishlist the game: https://bit.ly/3ybqjIA

Learn more about The Last Worker: https://wiredproductions.com/games/the-last-worker/ 

Follow Us On Twitch and join us on #WiredLive: 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/wiredp Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/WiredP 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WiredPro
Discord : https://discord.gg/wiredp
